channel.title: free-crochet-patterns on Cool Stuff
channel.description: Recent content in free-crochet-patterns on Cool Stuff

item.title: Ant
item.description: SKILL LEVEL: ⭐⭐⭐ SIZE: 8" / 20 cm tall when made with the indicated yarn. Ant pattern MATERIALS: Light worsted weight yarn in red, blue, white and brown Size C-2 / 2.75 mm crochet hook Safety eyes (10 mm) White embroidery thread Yarn needle Fiberfill for stuffing Optional: metal wire / pipe cleaner eye white (make 2, in white yarn) Rnd 1: start 6 sc in a magic ring [6] Don’t pull the magic ring too tightly.

item.title: Ant-eater
item.description: SKILL LEVEL: ⭐⭐⭐ SIZE: 6” / 15 cm tall when made with the indicated yarn. ant-eater pattern MATERIALS: Light worsted weight yarn in off-white, light brown and pink (leftover) B-1 / 2.5 mm crochet hook Safety eyes (10 mm) Yarn needle Fiberfill for stuffing body (start in off-white yarn) Rnd 1: start 6 sc in a magic ring [6] Rnd 2: inc in all 6 st [12]

item.title: Badger
item.description: SKILL LEVEL: ⭐⭐ SIZE: 8.5” / 21.5 cm tall when made with the indicated yarn. badger pattern MATERIALS: Worsted weight yarn in white, light gray and dark gray Size C-2 / 3 mm crochet hook Safety eyes (15 mm) Triangular safety nose (22mm x 16mm) Yarn needle Stitch markers Fiberfill for stuffing foot (make 2, start in dark gray yarn) We start by making two feet.

item.title: Brown Lion
item.description: SKILL LEVEL: ⭐⭐⭐ SIZE: 7.5” / 20 cm when made with the indi- cated yarn. lion pattern MATERIALS: Light worsted weight yarn in yellow, white and brown Size D-3 / 3 mm and E-4 / 3.5 mm crochet hook Safety eyes (20 mm) Stitch markers Yarn needle Long doll needle Fiberfill for stuffing head (start in white yarn) The head is worked from the muzzle to the back of the head.

item.title: bunny
item.description: SKILL LEVEL: ⭐⭐ SIZE: 6" / 15 cm tall when made with the indicated yarn. bunny pattern MATERIALS: Light worsted weight yarn in beige, cream, pink, orange, green (leftover) Sport weight yarn in black (leftover) C-2 / 3 mm crochet hook Safety eyes (9 mm) Yarn needle Stitch markers Pom pom maker or dining fork Fiberfill for stuffing head (in beige yarn) Rnd 1: start 6 sc in a magic ring [6]

item.title: Corgi Dog
item.description: SKILL LEVEL: ⭐⭐⭐ SIZE: 7.5” / 19 cm tall when made with the indicated yarn. corgy pattern MATERIALS: Worsted weight yarn in beige, white, brown (leftover) and green (leftover) Light worsted weight yarn in turquoise, yellow, white and pink C-2 / 3 mm crochet hook Safety eyes (12 mm) Stitch markers Fiberfill for stuffing head and body (start in beige yarn) Rnd 1: start 6 sc in a magic ring [6]

item.title: Crab
item.description: SKILL LEVEL: ⭐ SIZE: 6.5” / 17 cm tall when made with the indicated yarn. crab pattern MATERIALS Worsted weight yarn in red, coral, white and black Size D-3 / 3.25 mm crochet hook Black embroidery thread Yarn needle Fiberfill for stuffing eye stalk (make 2, in red yarn) Rnd 1: start 6 sc in a magic ring [6] Rnd 2: inc in all 6 st [12]

item.title: Crocodile
item.description: SKILL LEVEL: ⭐ SIZE: 6.5” / 16 cm tall when made with the indicated yarn. crocodile pattern MATERIALS: Sport weight yarn in green (3 balls), dark green, light green, white (leftover) B-1 / 2.5 mm crochet hook Oval safety eyes (12 mm) Yarn needle Pins Fiberfill for stuffing head (in green yarn) Rnd 1: start 6 sc in a magic ring [6] Rnd 2: inc in all 6 st [12]

item.title: Fox
item.description: SKILL LEVEL: ⭐⭐ SIZE: 7.5” / 20 cm when made with the indicated yarn. fox pattern MATERIALS: Sport weight yarn in orange, black, white and pink Size B-1 / 2.5 mm crochet hook Safety eyes (6 mm) Safety nose (12 mm) Stitch markers Black embroidery thread Yarn needle Fiberfill for stuffing head (in orange yarn) Rnd 1: start 6 sc in a magic ring [6]

item.title: Giraffe
item.description: SKILL LEVEL: ⭐ SIZE: 16.5” / 42 cm tall when made with the indicated yarn. giraffe pattern MATERIALS: Worsted weight yarn in yellow, beige, brown, pink (leftover) and black (leftover) Size G-6 / 4 mm crochet hook Safety eyes (12 mm) Yarn needle Pins Fiberfill for stuffing leg (make 4, start in brown yarn) Rnd 1: start 6 sc in a magic ring [6] Rnd 2: inc in all 6 st [12]

item.title: Goat
item.description: SKILL LEVEL: ⭐⭐ SIZE: 8" /20 cm tall when made with the indicated yarn. goat pattern MATERIALS: Worsted weight yarn in light brown, dark brown, off-white and blue Size D-3 / 3.25 mm crochet hook Safety eyes (10 mm) Yarn needle Yellow embroidery thread Fiberfill for stuffing 2 pipe cleaners head (in light brown yarn) Rnd 1: start 6 sc in a magic ring [6]

item.title: gorilla
item.description: SKILL LEVEL: ⭐⭐ SIZE: 9” / 23 cm tall when made with the indicated yarn. MATERIALS: Worsted weight yarn in navy blue and gray Size C-2 / 3 mm crochet hook Safety eyes (15 mm) Yarn needle Stitch markers Pins Fiberfill for stuffing Optional: brown eye shadow gorilla pattern snout (in gray yarn) Ch 12. Stitches are worked around both sides of the foundation chain.

item.title: Humming-Bird
item.description: SKILL LEVEL: ⭐⭐ SIZE: 6.5” / 16 cm when made with the indicated yarn. Humming-Bird pattern MATERIALS: Light worsted weight yarn in dark green, pale green, black and red Size E-4 / 3.5 mm crochet hook Safety eyes (12 mm) Fiberfill for stuffing Yarn needle Optional: black pipe cleaner beak (in black yarn) Rnd 1: start 5 sc in a magic ring [5] Rnd 2 – 6: sc in all 5 st [5]

item.title: kangoroo
item.description: SKILL LEVEL: ⭐ SIZE: 10” / 25 cm tall when made with the indicated yarn. kanguroo pattern MATERIALS: Sport weight yarn in brown (3 balls), beige, black (leftover) Size B-1 / 2.5 mm crochet hook Safety eyes (11 mm for Mama and 6 mm for Baby) Yarn needle Pins Stitch markers Fiberfill for stuffing head and body (in brown yarn) Rnd 1: start 6 sc in a magic ring [6]

item.title: Koala
item.description: SKILL LEVEL: ⭐⭐ SIZE: 4”/ 10 cm tall when made with the indicated yarn. koala pattern MATERIALS: Light worsted weight yarn in light gray, dark gray, light green, pink (leftover) Chunky weight fluffy yarn in white (the pattern also includes an option for ears made with regular light worsted weight yarn) B-1 / 2.5 mm crochet hook US-7 / 4.5 mm crochet hook Black embroidery thread Sewing needle Yarn needle Stitch markers Fiberfill for stuffing head (in light gray yarn) Starting at the top of the head.

item.title: Mouse
item.description: SKILL LEVEL: ⭐⭐ SIZE: 5.5" / 14 cm tall when made with the indicated yarn. mouse pattern MATERIALS: Sport weight yarn in gray, peach and beige (leftover) Fingering weight yarn in silver (leftover) Size B-1 / 2 mm crochet hook Safety eyes (6 mm) Pins Stitch markers Scissors Fiberfill for stuffing body (in gray yarn) Rnd 1: start 6 sc in a magic ring [6]

item.title: orange Lion
item.description: SKILL LEVEL: ⭐⭐⭐ SIZE: 6” / 15 cm tall when made with the indicated yarn. lion pattern MATERIALS: Light worsted weight yarn in yellow, brown, pink, orange and black (leftover) B-1 / 2.5 mm crochet hook Safety eyes (9 mm) Yarn needle Pins Stitch markers Fiberfill for stuffing Optional: wire or pipe cleaner hind leg (make 2, start in brown yarn) Rnd 1: start 7 sc in a magic ring [7]

item.title: Owl
item.description: SKILL LEVEL: ⭐⭐ SIZE: 4.5” / 11 cm tall when made with the indicated yarn. owl pattern MATERIALS: Light worsted weight yarn in purple, lilac and yellow Size C-2 / 3 mm crochet hook Safety eyes (15 mm) Yarn needle Fiberfill for stuffing eye patch (make 2, in yellow yarn) Rnd 1: start 6 sc in a magic ring [6] Rnd 2: inc in all 6 st [12]

item.title: Seal
item.description: SKILL LEVEL: ⭐⭐ SIZE: 8.5”/ 21 cm when made with the indicated yarn. seal pattern MATERIALS: Sport weight yarn in gray, pink and black Size B-1 / 2.5 mm crochet hook Safety eyes (13 mm) Yarn needle Pins Stitch markers Fiberfill for stuffing body (in gray yarn) Rnd 1: start 6 sc in a magic ring [6] Rnd 2: inc in all 6 st [12]

item.title: Sloth
item.description: SKILL LEVEL: ⭐ Sloth pattern SIZE: 7” / 18 cm when made with the indicated yarn. MATERIALS: Worsted weight yarn in cream, light brown, brown, beige, black Size E-4 / 3.5 mm crochet hook Safety eyes (15 mm) Black embroidery thread Fiberfill for stuffing eye Patch (make 2, in light brown yarn) Ch 7. Crochet in rows. Row 1: skip first ch on the hook, sc in next 6 st, ch 1, turn [6]

item.title: Squirrel
item.description: SKILL LEVEL: ⭐ SIZE: 8,5” / 22 cm tall when made with the indicated yarn. MATERIALS: Light worsted weight yarn in rusty red, cream, light brown and brown Size B-1 / 2.5 mm crochet hook Safety eyes (8 mm) Brown embroidery thread Yarn needle Pins Stitch marker Fiberfill for stuffing squirrel pattern head (start in cream yarn) Rnd 1: start 6 sc in a magic ring [6]

item.title: Turtle
item.description: SKILL LEVEL: ⭐ SIZE: 5” / 13 cm tall when made with the indicated yarn. turtle pattern MATERIALS: Fingering weight yarn in beige, pink, white, light green, green Size B-1 / 2.5 mm crochet hook Safety eyes (6 mm) Black embroidery thread Tapestry needle Pins Stitch marker Fiberfill for stuffing head (in beige yarn) Rnd 1: start 6 sc in a magic ring [6] Rnd 2: inc in all 6 st [12]
